title: Confessions: Fact or Fiction: A Collection of Short Stories and Memoir
description: A priest sleeps with a parishioner. A boy loses faith in his father. A girl ruins her cousin's marriage. A man is imprisoned with frog woman. Confessions: Fact or Fiction? is a collection of memoir and short fiction written by award winning authors. These stories of love, lies, loss, and betrayal explore the fragile boundary between truth and fiction, and invite the reader to decide which are true and which are not.
author: Herta B. Feely
